programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Middle of the World City: Ecuador - Glitch and his Glitchbots pretend to be the Go Jetters.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Solar Race: Australia - Glitch hopes to win a solar-powered race across the Australian outback.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Go Jetter Heroes: Amelia Earhart - Inspired by her hero Amelia Earhart, Xuli attempts a solo flight across the Atlantic.

programme.title: My World Kitchen S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Aksara's Sri Lankan Fish Curry - Aksara's curry contains a very special ingredient: tamarind.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Andy and the Walrus Pups - Andy heads out on an Arctic adventure to find out where walrus mothers nurse their pups.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep6
programme.desc: Holiday - Captain Captain decides she needs a break from Sandy and Seaweed and books a holiday.

programme.title: Panda and Krash S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Lilly is Ill - Lily is telling everyone the story about an orange kitten and spotted cat fishing.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Stumpfest - Dad and his mates hit the backyard, ready to rip up some tree stumps! But when Bluey and Bingo take over a stump as a nail salon, Dad finds he's got some negotiating to do.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Favourite Thing - When Bluey accidentally makes Bingo upset playing a game at dinner, she will do anything to make her happy again - even changing the rules of the game. But nothing seems to work.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Daddy Dropoff - Dad refuses to be late dropping off Bluey and Bingo at kindy and school, but the girls make Dad play so many games, they quickly derail his plan.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep21
programme.desc: The Chilli Rocket - Chilli says he's a great skateboarder but when Supertato needs his help, Chilli shows he can't skateboard at all. Chilli turns up the heat and his 'Chilli Rocket' defeats Evil Pea.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Wimbledon, England - The Go Jetters are at Centre Court in Wimbledon to watch the world's most famous tennis tournament.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Cave of Crystals, Mexico - Can Glitch be saved from the Cave of Crystals, Mexico before things get too hot to handle?

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Magic - Bluey teaches Bingo how to use magic so she can make Mum play with her, but she forgets to explain the most important rule: never use magic for cheekiness.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Chest - Dad tries to teach Bluey how to play chess, but Mum thinks she is still too young. When Bingo joins in, the kids make up their own rules, but they still can't beat Dad.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Sheep Dog - Dad agrees to play Sheepdog with Bluey and Bingo to stop them from disturbing Mum who is taking a well-earned rest, but looking after a sheep is harder work than they expected.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Three - LaaLaa has fun counting to three; 1, 2, 3 rabbits, 1, 2, 3 flowers and 1, 2, 3 trees! Laa-Laa even counts three Teletubbies; Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Po.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Let's Do The Tubby - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and "Do the Tubby!".

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Postie Plom - In this poptastic adventure, the friends are celebrating Valentine's Day. Plom is delivering everyone's cards, but tries to finish his deliveries in time for a big Valentine's Day game.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Dog Loves Yeti - Dog and Pug are trying to solve one of the world's great mysteries, and they meet Granny Pug trying to track down the Yeti.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Eye Spy - Messy and friends explore the forest with Tweedy. When her eyesight fails, Zim, Zam and Zoom lend a hand.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Snowflakes - It's summer in OKIDO, but Messy wants to chill out in the snow, so he's lucky when the snowflakes come out to play!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep61
programme.desc: Music Power - Monty investigates how music can make people feel different emotions, after Jeanie tells him that music should have that effect.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep37
programme.desc: It's time to make a rocket - Inspired by Captain Chloe, JoJo learns about astronauts and how they travelled through space to the moon.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep36
programme.desc: It's time to build a snowman! - It's a snowy day and JoJo and Gran Gran go to the park to build a snow panda!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Train Fudge - Sarah and Duck take an unexpected train trip whilst on their quest to buy some fudge.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Magic Panic - Umbrella needs Sarah and Duck's help after he promises to put on a magic show.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep15
programme.desc: Gordon and Rebecca - Coming Through! - Gordon and Rebecca do the same work, but go about it differently, and when Rebecca tries to be more like Gordon, it doesn't go well.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Weekend - At the weekend, Bluey and Bingo are playing in the garden with Dad. But Bingo gets upset when she discovers a walking leaf insect and Dad doesn't notice.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Bbq - It's lunchtime on Bluey's deck! But the BBQ needs a salad, so Bingo's relaxing sit-down will have to wait until she finds every colour of capsicum her cousins asked for!

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Fruit Bat - Not wanting to go to bed, Bluey tries to dream about being a nocturnal fruit bat so she can stay up all night long and soon finds herself flying through the night sky.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Turnip of Terror - Evil Pea tricks Supertato, and the Veggies, who fall into the Deli Counter and come face-to-face with the Turnip of Terror. They escape with help from the not so scary Turnip.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep6
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC 314: Volkanovski vs. Lopes
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the greatest featherweights of all-time gets the chance to regain his crown on April 12 when Alexander Volkanovski faces streaking Brazilian contender Diego Lopes for the vacant UFC featherweight championship in the main event of UFC 314 at Kaseya Center in Miami, Florida. Plus, its one of the most highly anticipated bouts of 2025 when British star Paddy Pimblett meets up with Iron Michael Chandler in a five-round co- main event showdown, and international sensation Patricio Pitbull battles former interim featherweight king Yair Rodriguez.

programme.title: UFC 314: Volkanovski vs. Lopes

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Emmett vs. Murphy
programme.desc: Prelims - Top 10 ranked featherweights Josh Emmett and Lerone Murphy clash on April 5th in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. One of the biggest punchers in the sport, Emmett makes his first start since his knockout of Bryce Mitchell in December of 2023 to face off with Manchester, Englands Lerone Murphy, an unbeaten rising star who is coming off back-to-back wins over Edson Barboza and Dan Ige.

Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep22
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1002UsmanvsCovington2
programme.desc: UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and Colby Chaos Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep911TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured the first title defense of newly crowned light heavyweight champion Glover Teixeira against surging contender Jiri Prochazka. See both men train and prepare for their battle for the belt in Singapore.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1804
programme.desc: Black History Month - UFC Unleashed is celebrating Black History Month with a look at some of 2022s most exciting fights to come from our roster of black athletes. Featuring Joaquin Buckley, Jared Cannonier, Chris Barnett, and more.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep701
programme.desc: Marcus McGhee, Fighter Focus: Mike Malott, Front Row: Drew Dober, Day One: Dricus Du Plessis - Marcus McGhee details his journey from a turbulent life - to the bright lights of the UFC. Mike Malott looks back on his many walks to the Octagon as coach before making his mark in the Octagon. We join Drew Dober Front Row as he watched the lightweight contenders battle it out in Austin. And South African sensations Dricus du Plessis takes us back to his UFC debut.

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 COLLECTIVE PLAY
programme.desc: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 COLLECTIVE PLAY - Nothing more satisfying than a flowing team move with the finish. 10 of the best plays from 22/23.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC303PereiravsProchazka2
programme.desc: After defending his belt in style at UFC 300, UFC Light Heavyweight Champion Alex Pereira makes the walk for the second time in as many months as he takes on Ji Prochzka in a main event rematch. And in the co-main, Dan Ige steps in with only a few hours notice to face featherweight phenom Diego Lopes in a catchweight classic. All this and much more on UFC Reloaded
